policies.dsl: select previous(severity) as previous_severity, severity as current_severity from eventStream where previous(severity) = 'CRITICAL' AND severity = 'NORMAL' for last ?critical_duration_time min
select previous(severity) as previous_severity, severity as current_severity from eventStream where previous(severity) = 'WARNING' AND severity = 'NORMAL' for last ?warning_duration_time min
select count(severity='CRITICAL') as criticalCount, count(severity) as count from eventStream where count(severity='CRITICAL') = count(severity) for last ?durationInMinutes min
select count(severity='WARNING') as warningCount, count(severity) as count from eventStream where count (severity='WARNING') = count(severity) for last ?durationInMinutes min
